mim.name: ReqRiLink
mim.description:
This Managed Object (MO) is used to configure and monitor a Radio Interface (RI) link. It contains references to the two Radio Interface Ports (RiPort) comprising the link.
The two RiPort references must be provisioned to make the configuration of the radio interface connection complete.

enumMember.name: DISABLED
enumMember.description: The resource is totally inoperable.

enumMember.name: ENABLED
enumMember.description: The resource is partially or fully operable.

enum.name: FronthaulDeviceLineRate
enum.description: Line rate of CPRI link. Used if fronthaul device is adopted.

enumMember.name: NOT_SET
enumMember.description: Line rate not set by operator.

enumMember.name: CPRI_LINE_RATE_2
enumMember.description: Line rate is CPRI line rate option 2, 1.2288 Gbps.

enumMember.name: CPRI_LINE_RATE_3
enumMember.description: Line rate is CPRI line rate option 3, 2.4575 Gbps

enumMember.name: CPRI_LINE_RATE_5
enumMember.description: Line rate is CPRI line rate option 5, 4.9152 Gbps

enumMember.name: CPRI_LINE_RATE_7
enumMember.description: Line rate is CPRI line rate option 7, 9.8304 Gbps

enumMember.name: CPRI_LINE_RATE_8
enumMember.description: Line rate is CPRI line rate option 8, 10.1376 Gbps

enum.name: AvailStatus
enum.description: The availability status is used to qualify the operational state. It indicates why the operational state has changed its value.

enumMember.name: IN_TEST
enumMember.description: The resource is undergoing a test procedure. If the administrative state is locked or shutting down, normal users are prevented from using the resource.

enumMember.name: FAILED
enumMember.description: The resource has an internal fault that prevents it from operating.

enumMember.name: POWER_OFF
enumMember.description: The resource requires power to be applied and is not powered on.

enumMember.name: OFF_LINE
enumMember.description: The resource requires a routine operation to be performed. This routine operation is to place the resource online and make it available for use. The operation may be manual or automatic, or both. The operational state is disabled.

enumMember.name: OFF_DUTY
enumMember.description: The resource has been made inactive by an internal control process.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY
enumMember.description: The resource cannot operate because some other resource on which it depends is unavailable.

enumMember.name: DEGRADED
enumMember.description: The service available from the resource is degraded in some respect.

enumMember.name: NOT_INSTALLED
enumMember.description: The resource represented by the managed object is not present, or is incomplete.

enumMember.name: LOG_FULL
enumMember.description: Indicates a log full condition. The semantics are defined in CCITT Rec. X.735 | ISO/IEC 10164-6.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_LOCKED
enumMember.description: The administrative state of a resource that this resource depends on is locked. or the availability status of the other resource is dependency locked.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_FAILED
enumMember.description: The availability status of a resource that this resource depends on is failed or dependency failed.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_SHUTTINGDOWN
enumMember.description: The administrative state of a resource that this resource depends on is shutting down. or the availability status of the other resource is dependency shutting down.

enum.name: RbsTransportType
enum.description: The transport type and protocol of the Radio Interface(RI) link. Change of this parameter during network runtime will trigger restart of CPRI link.

enumMember.name: CPRI_OVER_DWDM_LINEAR
enumMember.description: CPRI over DWDM in Linear configuration

enumMember.name: CPRI_OVER_DWDM_RING
enumMember.description: CPRI over DWDM in Ring configuration

enumMember.name: CPRI_OVER_CWDM_LINEAR
enumMember.description: CPRI over CWDM in Linear configuration

enumMember.name: CPRI_OVER_CWDM_RING
enumMember.description: CPRI over CWDM in Ring configuration

enumMember.name: CPRI_OVER_MICROWAVE_PTOP
enumMember.description: CPRI over Microwave in Point to Point configuration

enumMember.name: CPRI_OVER_MICROWAVE_PTOM
enumMember.description: CPRI over Microwave in Point to Multi-point configuration

enumMember.name: CPRI_OVER_GIGABIT_ETHERNET
enumMember.description: CPRI over Gigabit ehternet configuration

enumMember.name: NOT_SET
enumMember.description: Operator does not set the transport type

enumMember.name: CPRI_OVER_DIRECT_CABLE
enumMember.description: CPRI over Direct Cable configuration

class.name: RiLink
class.description:
This Managed Object (MO) is used to configure and monitor a Radio Interface (RI) link. It contains references to the two Radio Interface Ports (RiPort) comprising the link.
The two RiPort references must be provisioned to make the configuration of the radio interface connection complete.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule context="Equipment"> <assert test='are-distinct-values(concatenate(RiLink/riPortRef1, RiLink/riPortRef2))'>references on RiLink must be unique </assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule context="Equipment"> <assert test='are-distinct-values(concatenate(RiLink/riPortRef1, RiLink/riPortRef2))'>references on RiLink must be unique </assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: riLinkId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: riPortRef1
attribute.description: Refers to one RiPort on the unit to which the link is connected.

attribute.name: riPortRef2
attribute.description: Refers to the other RiPort on the unit to which the link is connected.

attribute.name: linkRate
attribute.description: The negotiated link rate for a CPRI or Ethernet link.

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description: The availability status. It contains details about operationalState.

attribute.name: transportType
attribute.description: The transport type and protocol of the Radio Interface(RI) link.
attribute.disturbances: Changing this attribute can cause loss of traffic.

attribute.name: linkTag
attribute.description:
CPRI link tag (32 bits). The linkTag contains two parts - Node identity part (24 bits) followed by Link identity part (8 bits). The node identity part is from the nodeTag attribute of CpriLinkTagging MO.
If 0, there is no linkTag set for this CPRI link.

attribute.name: fronthaulDeviceLineRate
attribute.description: Line rate of CPRI link. Used if fronthaul device is adopted.
